casebody.data:
NORTH HUDSON SEWERAGE AUTHORITY, a Body Corporate and Politic of the State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
HARTZ MOUNTAIN INDUSTRIES, INC., a New York Corporation, Defendant,
and
State of New Jersey and Township of Weehawken, a Municipal Corporation of the State of New Jersey, Defendants. North Hudson Sewerage Authority, a Body Corporate and Politic of the State of New Jersey, Plaintiff,
v.
Hartz Mountain Industries, Inc., a New York Corporation, State of New Jersey, and Township of Weehawken, a Municipal Corporation of the State of New Jersey, Defendants. 1500 Harbor Boulevard Partners, LLC, Petitioner. C-319 September Term 2018
081769 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 16, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-5011/5201-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs; and it is further

ORDERED that the notice of appeal is dismissed.
